sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; class About extends Component { render() { return (

About Me

Hey there,

I am Zary G. Manning

Front End Web Developer | UI/UX Designer



For the love of design and the love of learning, software development is a passion.



Reading about new technologies, solving once impossible problems, providing value to a company, these are the things that fuel my desire for personal growth.



To me, this career is about more than building websites. Rather, I see this career as one that provides a medium between business and the humanities. Having studied Anthropology at University, I must say, I find myself especially fond of the following quote:



“… technology alone is not enough… it’s technology married with liberal arts, married with the humanities, that yields us the results that make our heart sing.”



Steve Jobs was right. Technology will continue to make unknown things possible, it will continue to make our hearts sing. My hope is that my own heart can play a small role in making that technology both easy to use and beautiful.

) } } export default About
